name: UIBarPosition
desc: Constants to identify the position of a bar.

items.name: case any
items.desc: Specifies that the position is unspecified.

items.name: case bottom
items.desc: Specifies that the bar is at the bottom of its containing view.

items.name: case top
items.desc: Specifies that the bar is at the top of its containing view.

items.name: case topAttached
items.desc: Specifies that the bar is at the top of the screen, as well as its containing view.
